channel.title: Firemaking Problem [317]
channel.description:
I'm having a problem with firemaking on my server, when ever I try and light a log, it lights it but there is no animation it's just a still image, and when I have lit a fire my person does not move a space to light the next fire.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ic5w7t.gif[/img]

item.title: Firemaking Problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

I’m not quite sure on the graphics? Could it be from the client running in low-memory mode? But just add the ‘moving to the next space’ into wherever your server handles fire making.

Read full topic
